description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Validation: only want to translate soil moisture in NFL table if the row is either non_for_veg or nat_non_veg = EX (burned or exposed land).
No horizontal structure so structure percent is 100
Count layers up to max_layer_number which is set by the createMappingsView() function in the workflow.
No crown closure value for nfl
No crown closure value for nfl

Checks type_lnd is not empty and is in 'NW','NS','NE'. Then checks either landpos is 'A', or class is in 'R','L','RS','E','S','B','RR'. Translation converts landpos A to AP, and 'R','L','RS','E','S','B','RR' to 'RI','LA','WS','EX','SA','EX','RK'.
Checks type_lnd is not empty. Checks type_lnd is NU, and class is RD, G or T. Converts RD, G and T to OT.
Checks type_lnd is not empty. Checks type_lnd is VN, and class is S, H, C or M. Converts cl_mod of TS, TSo, TSc, LS to ST, ST, ST, SL. And classes of C, H and M to BR, HE and HE.
